subject: Re: Simsonn Order Confirmation #SSN2398
description_text:
Sure sorry I didn’t get this email until now

On Tue, Aug 19, 2025 at 8:34 PM SIMSONN <service@simsonn.com> wrote:

> SIMSONN <https://www.simsonn.com>
>
> Hello, the shipping cost to Hawaii is very high, 347.3 RMB, which is
> equivalent to 50 USD. We need you to pay an additional 20 USD for shipping.
> Is that acceptable to you?
>
> If you have any questions, reply to this email or contact us at
> service@simsonn.com
>

conversations.body_text: Hi Mcrider46,    Okay, you can click on the link to pay the shipping fee. Thank you for your understanding. We will ship your order as soon as possible.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/difference-2

Good morning, I paid the difference with order #SSN2422 for the amount of 193.70, and I paid through PayPal Pay in 4 twice. Am I going to get a refund from the previous or reverse the charge? I'll include several screenshots to get clarification on what's going on.
Hi Mcrider46,    Do you mean you only need one Haptics Reactor? But we have already shipped two sets of products to you.

Yes, that is correct. I just wanted to pay the 20-dollar difference, as you
couldn't send me in the first place, that's why I agreed on not buying two
sets.

SIMSONN <https://www.simsonn.com/>

Hello, the shipping cost to Hawaii is very high, 347.3 RMB, which is
equivalent to 50 USD. We need you to pay an additional 20 USD for shipping.
Is that acceptable to you?



On Sun, Aug 24, 2025 at 5:48 PM service@simsonn.com
